channel.title: 2 B A master
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "2 B A master" - do you need to be top 3 in your rank or season?

item.title: Re: 2 B A master
item.content:encoded: I was confused about when the ranking portion of the mission had to be completed, too. Since I've never seen it, I didn't know that the top three players in each rank receive notification about their status at dayroll.

item.title: Re: 2 B A master
item.content:encoded: You can start/finish the quest whenever you want, but you have to do the specific ranking part the day after you do your ranking run.

item.title: Re: 2 B A master
item.content:encoded: question towards 2 b a master: do u have to do the quest the same day as u do the ranking run or the next day when your supposed to be e,g, "yesterday's top player" ?

item.title: Re: 2 B A master
item.content:encoded: Use the Ranking Guide for more info on how to get the most Ranking xp but basically you just need to have the most ranking xp in your rank such as sannin or jonin and you can check if you had the most the previous day by going to the sign in page and check the top daily players (also on main page). Then check the top 3 names in your rank and see if your name is there, if so, then you can complete the quest.

item.title: Re: 2 B A master
item.content:encoded: i still dont get it. can someone walk me through this?

item.title: Re: 2 B A master
item.content:encoded: You can be Top 3 in just your Rank and still complete the mission

item.title: 2 B A master
item.content:encoded: do you need to be top 3 in your rank or season or something else entirely diffrent?
